entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Mac Catalyst does not support resizing or repositioning windows programatically #9704
  • Setting the X/Y positions initial values on Window doesn't propagate when the window is first initialized #9703
    .NET 7
  • Switching the MAUI Controls Gallery to RTL causes the currently visible view to not resize correctly #9702
  • Clicking the RTL Switch in our control gallery makes it unclickable #9701
  • Running a .NET MAUI Blazor app from VS that was previously built and run takes a surprisingly long time #9700
  • Use of FlyoutHeaderBehavior="CollapseOnScroll" causes an exceptio #9699
  • maui workloads not installed through visual studio installer #9698
  • Maui android published apk crash #9697
  • Cannot assign permissions for MAUI app in windows #9696
  • Top Navigation Menu bar does not show up on MAUIBlazor deployed to iPhone with iOS 15.6 #9693
  • Need Material Design implemented as part of Visual quite like Xamarin.Forms #9689
  • Infinity loop lifecycle when unfocused from the app between OnDisappearing and OnAppearing #9688
  • Shell TitleView disappearing on tab change #9687
  • Shell.FlyoutFooterTemplate doesn't display Grid control #9685
  • Native Crash when BindingContext is used on iOS Simulator #9683
  • [Enhancement] Double Flyover in Shell Copy of feature request from XForms #9674
  • Adding a conditional compilation symbol generate the symbol 'TRACETRACE' #9673
  • Not Rules for Android JAR SDK #9672
  • StackLayout, slow adding #9671
  • ISecureStorage.GetAsync should return nullable string #9670
  • Customised CollectionView (inherited from) does not [ScrollTo] and display selection correctly #9669

Closed

  • Move Maps to handler architecture #3933
    7.0-rc1
  • Warning in MAUI when referencing a project with GenerateDocumentationFile true #7272
  • Docs don't show up in Intellisense for .NET MAUI types #5341
    6.0-servicing
  • Problem with object on Android platform #9601

PullRequests

Created

  • Add Maui project capability for development #9695
  • [Windows ] Fix Shell SearchBarHandler #9679
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/shell 🐢
  • Notify CheckBox Foreground update after Color changed (not before) #9678
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-checkbox
  • [Housekeeping] Added new Border samples to the Gallery #9676
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Enable Graphics API docs generation #9675
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎

Merged

  • Implement PointerGestureRecognizer #9592
    area/desktop 🖥️
  • Windows message loop manager #9614
    platform/windows 🪟, area/lifecycle 🔁, area/desktop 🖥️, 7.0-rc1
  • Reducing the maps API space #9682
    area/controls 🎮, control-map
  • The entire Tizen API has changed #9690
  • [ci] Add support to net6.0 for multi-targeting in VS #9642
  • [net6.0][Tizen] Replace Tizen Backend engine #9620
    community ✨, partner/tizen
  • Remove code left in while spiking secondary click on android #9684
  • Changed default Border StrokeShape value #8521
    area/drawing ✏️, t/housekeeping ♻︎, .NET 7
  • Implement .NET MAUI Maps #7886
    area/controls 🎮, control-map, .NET 7
  • [main][Tizen] Replace Tizen Backend engine #9619
    community ✨, 7.0-rc1
  • Bump System.Text.Json from 6.0.5 to 6.0.6 #9603
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #9665
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • Enable Window Sizing #4942
    t/enhancement ☀️, platform/macOS 🍏, platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, 7.0-rc1
  • Blazor Hybrid CSS Hot Reload Fixes #9645
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • Remove GetEffectiveFlowDirection and defer flow direction handling to platforms #9558
  • Obsolete OpenGLView #9660
  • Allow custom layout managers for existing layout types in Controls #9470
    area/layout 🔲
  • Bump Xamarin.Android.Glide from 4.13.2.1 to 4.13.2.2 #9317
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
